verbose_text: Glutathione peroxidase (GPX; EC : 1.11.1.9) activity was enumerated according to Elia et al. [XREF_BIBR], using reaction buffer containing 100 mM K-P buffer (pH 7.0), 1 mM EDTA, 1mM sodium azide (NaN 3), 0.12 mM NADPH, 2 mM GSH, and 1 unit of GR, using 0.6 mM H 2 O 2 as the substrate, and the activity was expressed as nmol min -1 mg -1 of protein.
evidence: NADPH, 2 mM GSH, and 1 unit of GR, using 0.6 mM H 2 O 2  as the substrate, and the activity was expressed
